product_name: REI Sport Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: With a ruched V-neckline and quick-drying performance fabric, the women's REI Sport Tank Top outfits you for hard-charging workouts and warm-weather walks around the neighborhood. Moisture-wicking brushed polyester fabric offers UPF 50+ protection. Forward-shifted seams are strategically placed to avoid chafing while you move. Overstock.
short_description: With a ruched V-neckline and quick-drying performance fabric, the women's REI Sport Tank Top outfits you for hard-charging workouts and warm-weather walks around the neighborhood.
